stories.name: Basic
stories.description:
Live demonstration showing real-time relative formatting.
The relative time updates every second.

stories.name: Five Minutes Ago
stories.description: Shows formatting for a date 5 minutes in the past.
stories.source:
import { } from "@choice-ui/date-formatting" export default function App() { const date = new Date(Date.now() - 5 * 60 * 1000) return (
Input Date: {date.toISOString()}
Relative Time:
{formatRelativeTime(date, { language: "en" })}
Simple Date:
{formatSimpleDate(date, { language: "en" })}
Time Only:
{formatTime(date, { language: "en" })}
) }

stories.name: Specific Time Mode
stories.description: When `showSpecificTime` is enabled, shows 'Today at 2:30 PM' style formatting for recent dates.
stories.source:

Input Date: {date.toISOString()}
Relative Time (with showSpecificTime):
{formatRelativeTime(date, options)}
Simple Date:
{formatSimpleDate(date, options)}
Time Only:
{formatTime(date, options)}
) }

stories.name: Custom Thresholds
stories.description: Custom thresholds control when to switch from relative time to absolute dates.
stories.source:
import { } from "@choice-ui/date-formatting" export default function App() { const date = new Date(Date.now() - 10 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000) const options = { language: "en" as const, daysThreshold: 30, yearThreshold: 2 } return (
Input Date: {date.toISOString()}
Options: daysThreshold: 30, yearThreshold: 2
Relative Time:
{formatRelativeTime(date, options)}
Simple Date:
{formatSimpleDate(date, options)}
Time Only:
{formatTime(date, options)}
) }

stories.name: Custom Formats
stories.description: Custom format strings allow complete control over date/time display patterns.
stories.source:

Relative Time:

stories.source:

Simple Date:

Time Only:

) }

stories.name: All Languages Comparison
stories.description: Side-by-side comparison of all 10 supported languages formatting the same date.
stories.source:
import { } from "@choice-ui/date-formatting" export default function App() { const date = new Date(Date.now() - 2 * 60 * 60 * 1000) const languages: SupportedLanguage[] = [ "en", "cn", "ja", "ko", "es", "fr", "de", "pt", "ru", "ar", ] return (
{languages.map((language) => (
{language.toUpperCase()}
{formatRelativeTime(date, { language })}
{formatSimpleDate(date, { language })}
{formatTime(date, { language })}
))}
) }

stories.name: All Formatting Modes
stories.description: Demonstrates all major formatting modes and options available.
stories.source:
import { } from "@choice-ui/date-formatting" export default function App() { const date = new Date(Date.now() - 10 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000) const modes = [ { name: "Default Relative", options: {} }, { name: "Show Specific Time", options: { showSpecificTime: true } }, { name: "Force Numeric", options: { forceNumericFormat: true } }, { name: "Custom Threshold (30 days)", options: { daysThreshold: 30 } }, { name: "Year Threshold (2 years)", options: { yearThreshold: 2 } }, { name: "Custom Formats", options: { customFormat: { fullDate: "dd/MM/yyyy", monthDay: "MMM dd", time: "HH:mm:ss", }, }, }, ] as const return (
{modes.map((mode) => (
{mode.name}
English
{formatRelativeTime(date, { ...mode.options, language: "en" })}
中文
{formatRelativeTime(date, { ...mode.options, language: "cn" })}
日本語
{formatRelativeTime(date, { ...mode.options, language: "ja" })}
한국어
{formatRelativeTime(date, { ...mode.options, language: "ko" })}
))}
) }
